cells.data:
-- apLR (<*>) :: Either e (a -> b) -> Either e a -> Either e b
on apLR(flr, lr)
    if missing value is |Left| of flr then
        if missing value is |Left| of lr then
            |Right|(|Î»|(|Right| of lr) of mReturn(|Right| of flr))
        else
            lr
        end if
    else
        flr
    end if
end apLR
